name: Sans Visage: Prologue
description:
Sans Visage is a textless point-and-click game featuring white stickman-like characters, from which the game holds its name.

In this game, the player controls a character evolving in a mysterious environment

All characters in this game are procedurally animated.

DISCLAIMER : The original game was meant to hold much more content, but life decided otherwise... I am planning to release the original game later under the name "Sans Visage 1". Thus, this game had to be number 0.

This game and the original idea are based on real-life events.
